## Question 7
**while statements: section 4.1.3, exercises 5**

```{r}
i <- 0.006
diff <- 1
n <- 1
while (diff > 0.000001)
{
  diff <- abs(i-((1-((1+i)^(-20)))/19))
  i <- (1-((1+i)^(-20)))/19
  n <- n+1
}
print(i)
cat("the number of iterations required to get two successive values of the interest rate that are less than 0.000001 apart is",n,".")

```
